comments:
Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the community of Bedwas & 
    Machen. See also Table 2, notes (a) and (k).

That part which until 1.4.1935 formed part of the parish of Mynyddislwyn. 
    See also Table 2, note (c).

Abolished 1.4.1955 and added to the parish of Caerleon. See 
    also Table 2, note (a).

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Langstone. See also 
    Table 2, notes (a) and (l).

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Llanfihangel Rogiet. 
    See also Table 2, notes (j) and (l).

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Lower Machen. See 
    also Table 2, notes (a) and (l).

Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the community of Bedwas & 
    Machen. See also Table 2, notes (a) and (k).
Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Peterstone Wentlooge. See also Table 2, notes (a), (i) and (l).

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of St. Brides Wentlooge. 
    See also Table 2, notes (a), (h) and (l).
